file_content.text: --repeat: Republic call sign Aurek Nen--hey! Finally!
Theron. Are you all right?
Hey yourself, Theron. So, you finally got up the nerve to ask for some flying lessons.
This is no joke, Captain!
That would be a negative, Master Jedi!
Not exactly, Barsen'thor!
I'm in Imperial space, over Ziost. Tried to slip in, help out my ground team, but I used the wrong set of clearance codes and shields are low!
Focus on getting yourself to safety, then we'll talk.
Concentrate.
No, you really need to hear what I have to say.
And why exactly do you have a ground team on Ziost?
What are you up to?
You can't just fly into Imperial space. Use your head!
You're out of your mind.
Hey, this is the last place I want to be right now!
Asking myself the same damn thing.
Theron. Give me a sitrep.
Appreciate the sentiment, Major, but you need to know what's going on.
I was getting reports: demented soldiers; slave and civilian populations under fire. Had suspicions of what it meant, but I wasn't sure.
You were supposed to keep me in the loop about him.
Oh, the Emperor. Sure. You know, I feel like we never talk anymore.
I'm supposed to be the first one you contact when it comes to him, not your last resort.
I sent a team in dark to investigate, maybe handle it, but it's all gone out of control now. I think it's him. The Emperor.
I'll be there as soon as I can. You hang on, Theron.
On my way. Stay safe.
Yeah, I'm trying....
You should have come to me.
[Say nothing]
I should have said something--I know.
Sending through the right set of clearance codes along with the coordinates to meet my--
I'm hit! Going to try to land this thing! Don't come looking for me, I'll--
Theron? Theron, come in!
--repeat: Republic call sign Aurek Nen--hey! Finally!
Theron. Are you all right?
I'm in Imperial space, over Ziost. Tried to slip in, help out my ground team, but I used the wrong set of clearance codes and shields are low!
Focus on getting yourself to safety, then we'll talk.
Concentrate.

[Say nothing]
